rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Combine/AnyPublisher/init(_:) crawled: 2025-12-06T13:58:27Z --- # init(_:) **Initializer** Creates a type-erasing publisher to wrap the provided publisher. ## Declaration ```swift init

(_ publisher: P) where Output == P.Output, Failure == P.Failure, P : Publisher ``` ## Parameters - **publisher**: A publisher to wrap with a type-eraser.
title: init(_:)
